subject: [Radiance-general] VRML -> Radiance translator ?
body:
--------------0BF5758459EAFE3AE0A812FD Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hi all, anyone know of a VRML (virtual-reality-marker-language, 3d geometry for the web) to/from Radiance translator ? (VRML-1.0 would be fine) TIA1e6 Peter -- pab-opto, Freiburg, Germany, www.pab-opto.de --------------0BF5758459EAFE3AE0A812FD Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hi all,

anyone know of a VRML (virtual-reality-marker-language, 3d geometry for the web)
to/from Radiance translator ? (VRML-1.0 would be fine)

TIA1e6
Peter
